instructions.title: How to use Base64 to PNG Converter

steps.title: Paste your Base64 string
steps.description: Copy and paste your Base64-encoded PNG data into the input area. The tool automatically detects data URL prefixes and removes them if present.

steps.title: Validate Base64 format
steps.description: The tool automatically validates your Base64 input and shows estimated file size. It checks for valid PNG headers to ensure data integrity.

steps.title: Set custom filename (optional)
steps.description: Customize the output filename if needed. The tool auto-generates a timestamped filename by default for easy organization.

steps.title: Convert and preview
steps.description: Click 'Convert to PNG' to process the data. The tool displays PNG information including dimensions, color type, bit depth and provides an instant preview with transparency support before downloading.

steps.title: Download your PNG
steps.description: Click 'Download PNG' to save the converted image to your device. The preview with checkered background shows transparency correctly.

troubleshooting: Invalid Base64 error: Ensure input contains only valid Base64 characters (A-Z, a-z, 0-9, +, /, =)
No PNG header found: The data may be valid Base64 but not a PNG image - check the source
Preview not showing: Check browser console for errors or try a smaller image
Memory issues: Try toggling preview off for very large PNG files
Transparency not visible: The checkered background should make transparent areas obvious
Wrong colors: Ensure the Base64 data wasn't corrupted during copy/paste
